sources.title: The Wolf Man (1941)
sources.description: The Wolf Man is a 1941 American Gothic horror film written by Curt Siodmak and produced and directed by George Waggner. The film stars Lon Chaney Jr. in the title role.ItcfollowsÂ  LarryTalbot as he returns to his ancestral home in Wales to bury his brother and reconnect with his father. After being bitten by a werewolf, he transforms into one himself, leading to tragic events as he struggles with his new identity and the curse that comes with it.

metadata.Plot: Upon the death of his brother, Larry Talbot returns from America to his ancestral home in Wales. He visits a gypsy camp with village girl Jenny Williams, who is attacked by Bela, a gypsy who has turned into a werewolf. Larry kills the werewolf but is bitten during the fight. Bela's mother tells him that this will cause him to become a werewolf at each full moon. Larry confesses his plight to his unbelieving father, Sir John, who then joins the villagers in a hunt for the wolf. Transformed by the full moon, Larry heads for the forest and a fateful meeting with both Sir John and Gwen Conliffe.
metadata.Actors: Claude Rains, Warren William, Ralph Bellamy
